   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = week 51 of 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = week 37 of -10


=head2 Miscellaneous

=head3 Prefers 24 hour time?

No

=head3 Local first day of the week

7 (रविवासरः)

=head2 Strftime Patterns

=head3 %c (%A %d %b %Y %I:%M:%S %p) - date time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = मंगलवासरः 05 फरवरी: 2008 06:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = शुक्रवासरः 22 दिसंबर: 1995 09:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = शनिवासरः 15 सितंबर: -10 04:44:23 AM

=head3 %x (%-d-%m-%y) - date format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = %-d-02-08
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = %-d-12-95
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = %-d-09-10

=head3 %X (%I:%M:%S %p %Z) - time format

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 06:30:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 AM UTC

=head1 SUPPORT

See L<DateTime::Locale>.

=cut
